entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Gameti
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:21 PM MST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -36.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gameti Airport 8:00 PM MST Friday 17 February 2023
Temperature: -36.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.0 kPa falling
Humidity: 71 %
Dewpoint: -39.6°C
Wind: 0 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 40.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Ice fog patches. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 40. Wind chill minus 42 this evening and minus 51 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 32.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Ice fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 32. Wind chill minus 51 in the morning and minus 38 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 17 February 2023
